title: BUbreakingHeadlines
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingHeadlines, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: Trump administration orders 'abrupt' recall of dozens of career diplomats: Source
items.description: Trump administration recalls dozens of career diplomats from overseas posts in the next month, according to a source familiar with the matter.

items.title: What's behind the surge in gold and silver prices?
items.description: Analysts point to rising geopolitical tensions and softer monetary policy as driving the year-end surge.

items.title: An American Dream at risk: What happens to a small Nebraska town when 3,200 workers lose their jobs
items.description: Tyson Foods is closing its beef plant in Lexington, Nebraska, laying off 3,200 workers next month in a town of just 11,000.
